keyMoments.title: Observation Haki Awakening
keyMoments.description: Koby's Observation Haki awakens during the trauma of the Marineford War. He collapses, overwhelmed by sensing every human presence on the battlefield and experiencing the deaths of hundreds of combatants.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Koby's awakening to Haki through extreme stress. This involuntary awakening is traumatic but establishes his potential as a future powerful Marine. Doctor Fishbonen later confirms this was Haki.
keyMoments.quote: The voices... they're fading away... one by one!

keyMoments.title: Desperate Plea to Stop the War
keyMoments.description: Overwhelmed by the deaths he senses, Koby stands in the middle of the battlefield and begs both sides to stop fighting, arguing that the Marines have won and further bloodshed is meaningless.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most courageous acts in the series. A low-ranking Marine risks execution to save lives, demonstrating true moral courage. This moment allows Law to escape with Luffy, literally saving the protagonist's life.
keyMoments.quote: Please stop! The fighting is over! We've already won! Each of these soldiers has a family waiting for them!

keyMoments.title: Nearly Executed by Akainu
keyMoments.description: Admiral Akainu attempts to execute Koby for wasting precious seconds of the war, viewing his plea as betrayal of Marine justice.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the extreme danger Koby faced for his moral stand and establishes the conflict between absolute justice and moral justice.

keyMoments.title: Saved by Shanks
keyMoments.description: Shanks arrives at the last second and blocks Akainu's magma fist, saving Koby's life and taking responsibility for him.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes a connection between Koby and Shanks. Being saved by one of the Four Emperors validates Koby's actions and marks him as someone important to the world's future.

keyMoments.title: Shanks' Prophecy
keyMoments.description: Shanks declares that Koby's few seconds of courage will greatly change the fate of the world, for better or worse.
keyMoments.significance: A prophecy from one of the strongest characters in the series, suggesting Koby will become a major figure who shapes the world's future. This validates his moral courage and foreshadows his rise to prominence.

abilities.description: The ability to sense the presence, emotions, and intent of others. Koby's awakening was traumatic, forcing him to experience all the deaths on the battlefield.

reveals.information: Awakens Observation Haki during the Marineford War
Demonstrates profound moral courage by risking execution to save lives

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Shanks makes his dramatic entrance at Marineford, appearing at the critical moment to block Akainu's attack on Koby. His arrival stuns the entire battlefield.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic moments in One Piece. Shanks' arrival marks his first major intervention in the main storyline since early in the series. His casual blocking of an Admiral's attack demonstrates his overwhelming power.
keyMoments.quote: That's enough. This young Marine's life... I'll take responsibility for it.

keyMoments.title: Prophecy About Koby
keyMoments.description: Shanks recognizes the significance of Koby's actions and declares that his seconds of courage will change the fate of the world.
keyMoments.significance: Possibly using advanced Observation Haki, Shanks sees Koby's potential future impact on the world. This prophecy establishes Koby as a future major figure.
keyMoments.quote: These few seconds of courage you displayed will greatly change the fate of the world, for better or worse.

keyMoments.title: Declares Intent to End the War
keyMoments.description: Shanks announces to all assembled Marines and pirates that he has come to end the Marineford War.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Shanks' unique position as someone who can command respect from all sides and his role as a balance-keeper in the world.
keyMoments.quote: I've come here to put an end to this war!

reveals.information: Casually blocks Admiral Akainu's magma attack with his sword
Acts as a peacemaker and balance-keeper in the world

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Arrives to Rescue Luffy
keyMoments.description: Law and the Heart Pirates arrive at Marineford in their submarine to rescue Monkey D. Luffy and Jinbe from the battlefield.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Law's alliance with Luffy and shows his willingness to risk everything to save him. This decision shapes the entire future of the series and the relationship between the Straw Hats and Heart Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: Bring Straw Hat Luffy to me!

keyMoments.title: Successfully Escapes with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Law's submarine successfully submerges and escapes from Marineford with Luffy and Jinbe during the chaos created by Koby's plea and Shanks' arrival.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's survival depends on this successful escape. This moment ensures the series can continue and marks the beginning of Law's crucial role in Luffy's journey.

reveals.information: Willing to risk his life and crew to save Luffy during the war

name.japanese: マーシャル・D・ティーチ

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Gura Gura no Mi Mastery
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard uses the Gura Gura no Mi to tilt Marineford with his 'Shima Yurashi' attack, causing massive earthquakes and tsunamis that reach as far as Sabaody Archipelago.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Blackbeard's growing mastery of the stolen earthquake power and establishes him as a world-level threat. Despite admitting inexperience, he demonstrates devastating destructive capability.
keyMoments.quote: I'll sink Marineford to the bottom of the ocean!

abilities.description: Blackbeard grabs the sky and swings his hands down, tilting entire islands and creating massive earthquakes and tsunamis.

reveals.information: Can use advanced earthquake techniques like Shima Yurashi despite being new to the power

keyMoments.title: Threatens Admiral Kizaru
keyMoments.description: Benn Beckman appears behind Admiral Kizaru and holds him at gunpoint, threatening to shoot if Kizaru moves. Despite being a light human, Kizaru complies and stops his attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the incredible threat level of Shanks' first mate. The fact that an Admiral respects Beckman's threat enough to stop attacking Luffy speaks volumes about the Red Hair Pirates' power.

reveals.information: Powerful enough to threaten Admiral Kizaru and make him comply
